3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Brick Tudor Treasure! Nestled on tree-lined Berkeley Way, this 3-4 bd & 2 ba timeless-head-turner, is bursting with curb appeal where brick porch arches, leaded windows, & speakeasy door, create the perfect lasting hello. Once inside, it's immediately evident that this home exudes warmth, charm, with tasteful loving touches. Original wedding cake ceilings, picture rail molding, wood floors w/inlay, celebrate the craftsmanship of yesteryear. Spacious living rm with custom gas insert fireplace make for an artful centerpiece. Formal dining rm with its adjacent porch is an ideal spot for a pre-dinner toast. The kitchen will inspire the chef within you with its elevated appliances, custom cabinetry & ambient lighting, honed granite counters, & sunny kitchen nook that's a cherished cozy spot. Great family room space meets the stunning spindled staircase leading you upstairs in style where you'll feel worlds away. Sensational primary suite w/walk-in closet highlights the amazing-use-of-space, leaving no stone unturned. Showstopper custom marble bathroom w/jet air tub, skylight, double sinks, walk-in shower, & radiant heated floors. Magical backyard where a hot tub is tucked under an arbor

Remarks: Historic, spacious, and rare gem located in the very vibrant and trendy pocket of Sacramento we all love; where mature trees line the streets and various restaurants, cafes, and socializing spots are just a stone's throw away. This gorgeous and well-maintained 1942 beauty is an airy, remarkable 3 bedroom/ 2 bathroom with not one, but two living spaces! 3969 Colonial Way is truly where classic charm and character meet modern practicality and convenience! Pristine hardwood floors, elegant plantation shutters, newly remodeled chef's kitchen with quartz countertops and premium Miele, Blue Star, and Bosch appliances, updated dual pane windows throughout, open and newly landscaped backyard with endless opportunities, certified roof, newer water heater, 12-station smart irrigation system, etc. The list goes on! Don't forget about the investment angle with the rapidly expanding UC Davis Medical Center/Aggie Square just one block away!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: In great condition and easily exhibited, this Elmhurst cottage, true to its period, offers an unusually spacious T Street Parkway residence with 2 beds and 1 bath. The property includes a 2-car garage with a workbench, and an unfinished basement and attic that hold potential. Positioned for convenience, character, and quality, this extraordinary property is ready for immediate occupancy.From the curb & gated European porch, it unfolds into formal living and dining rooms, a kitchen, nook, and utility room. Bedrooms and a bath, equipped with both tub & shower stall, are down the hall, leading to the rear yard. The charming home features a landscaped backyard with a cabana, housing a pizza oven, and fencing of brick, iron, and wood. This spacious home offers location, character, quality, and readiness. Make your mark on this classic T Street charmer with two beds and one bath, an unfinished basement and attic, and immediate move-in readiness. It's not just size but also potential, with a 2-car detached garage and versatile spaces. Promoting its proximity to job opportunities, it's just blocks away from UC Med Center/Aggie Square & a short drive to Sac State, midtown, downtown, Sutter, and Mercy hospitals. Restaurants & retail options surround, with accessible public transportation.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Fab Forties elegant Tudor on storybook street! Charming home with gorgeous curb-appeal, exceptional design & private backyard. This split level home offers a hard to find floor plan in desirable East Sac. Living room includes a fireplace, round ceiling, rare diamond shaped leaded glass windows & beautiful hardwood floors with accents that complement the architecture. There is a formal dining area with French doors that lead to the side patio. A chef's kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas stove, white cabinets, granite countertops & breakfast nook. Upstairs are 2 bedrooms, one is the large primary with a walk-in closet this primary bedroom also has a balcony overlooking the tranquil backyard. Upstairs full bathroom has crown molding & built-ins. The lower level offers a 3rd room with backyard access & the 2nd full bathroom. Don't forget to check out the basement. Behind the home is a private gated alley that provides secure access to the back driveway that leads to the garage including an Electric car charger. Beautiful lush backyard with trellis & Pergola. Minutes to restaurants, mid-town, public transportation, parks, Sutter Lawn Tennis, HWY access.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to your dream home in the heart of 2023! This charming 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom residence is the epitome of modern living, making it perfect for both first-time homebuyers and savvy investors. Step inside to discover a meticulously upgraded interior that seamlessly blends classic charm with contemporary comforts. The open-concept living area boasts abundant natural light, providing a warm and inviting atmosphere. The kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring state-of-the-art appliances, sleek countertops, and ample storage space for all your culinary adventures. Both bedrooms offer comfortable spaces to relax and unwind, while the fully renovated bathroom exudes luxury with its modern fixtures and stylish design. This property's location is unbeatable, conveniently situated near major freeways for easy commuting, a hospital for peace of mind, and downtown for endless entertainment options. Whether you're looking to settle down or invest in the booming real estate market, this home offers an incredible opportunity. Don't miss your chance to own a piece of the future in this immaculate, upgraded, and superbly located residence. Your 2023 dream home awaits!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Location is everything! QUIET street & a perfect cottage nestled in the Med Center enclave area. This 2 bed/ 1 bath dream welcomes you. Approx. 1030sqft home features an open, luminous living area complete with the quintessential brick fireplace, built in shelves & an informal dining room. The kitchen welcomes you with a gas range, granite counter tops, custom backsplash, and cork walls. Complete with a breakfast area also. Both bedrooms are gracious in size and enjoy an upscale Jack-n-Jill bathroom that boasts a rain shower, spa-like Airtub, heated towel warmer and a chic dual vanity sink area. There's a large private retreat out back with ideal space for dining, entertaining and gardening - including fruit trees & mature foliage. Other amenities include rich hardwood floors, a tankless water heater, copper plumbing and a newer sewer line (2020).

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Enchanting East Sacramento Tudor, boasting exceptional curb appeal with an inviting front yard deck, trellis-adorned flowering gardens, and the sounds of a calming fountain. The open concept interior features a seamless flow between the living, dining, kitchen, breakfast nook, and family rooms, with easy access to the beautifully designed entertainment patios. These outdoor spaces include an outdoor fireplace, multiple seating areas, and raised garden beds. The 2020 remodel has infused modern luxury into every corner, with luxuriously appointed kitchen and baths, gorgeous picture windows, hardwood floors and smooth, imperfect smooth white walls add a touch of sophistication, while Anderson wood-clad windows and elegant window coverings enhance the overall aesthetic. The primary suite is on the first floor, while upstairs hosts two guest bedrooms, laundry closet and a versatile loft/office. The Chef's kitchen, a central hub for daily living, is designed for both functionality and style. A double-gated driveway provides ample space for vehicle, RV, or additional area for entertaining leading to a versatile 1-car that doubles as a workroom and bar. This East Sac Tudor is a perfect blend of indoor and outdoor living, designed for both comfort and style.
Confidential Remarks: Easy to show, Call or text agent for appt. Pre-opened with Fidelity National Title. County has square footage at 2156, which is correct but MLS still shows that it is a 4/2. House is a 3/2.5 with a loft/upstairs retreat.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 3640 Downey Way, a charming bungalow nestled in the heart of Sacramento. Built in 1934, this home exudes vintage charm combined with modern updates, offering a cozy retreat for its next lucky owner. As you step inside, you're greeted by the warmth of oak hardwood floors that flow seamlessly throughout the main living areas. The inviting living room features a wood-burning fireplace, perfect for cozying up on chilly evenings. The updated kitchen is a chef's delight, boasting quartz countertops, sleek cabinets, a stainless steel oven hood, and stylish vinyl flooring. Entertain guests or unwind with family in the spacious family room, complete with plush carpeting for comfort. The home offers four bedrooms, with two downstairs bedrooms featuring the timeless elegance of hardwood floors. Upstairs, two additional bedrooms await, showcasing custom built-in cabinets. Step back in time with the 1930's style tile work in the bathroom, adding character and charm to the space. Outside, the large backyard provides plenty of room for outdoor enjoyment and includes a convenient shed for storage. Located close to the UCD Med Center, this home offers easy access to amenities, shopping, and dining. Some pictures virtually staged.
Confidential Remarks: Please review attached home inspection report and write offer accordingly. Fridge, washer and dryer to stay with the home at no value and no warranty. Rooms added by previous owner, permits unknown. Buyer to verify square footage and permits. Sellers would prefer an As-Is sale. Not sure if an FHA loan will work for this home. Some pictures virtually staged.

Public Remarks: Step into the timeless allure of this East Sacramento gem at 1113 33rd Street. This classic craftsman home, featuring 2-3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, exudes charm with its original molding and craftsmanship. Meticulously updated in 2008, the residence seamlessly blends modern amenities with historic character, showcasing hardwood floors, stunning layered molding and coved ceilings. A large partially finished basement adds versatility to the layout, while the convenience of a new washer, dryer, and fridge in the home enhances daily living. Situated in the heart of East Sacramento, you're just moments away from local hotspots such as Sacyard, Kru, and Tres Hermanas. Don't miss the chance to embrace the perfect blend of classic charm and contemporary living.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Step back in time with this charming Tudor-style home in East Sacramento. It boasts 3 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms, and 1271 square feet of historical elegance. Built in 1929, this home is nearing its centennial, exuding character and timeless appeal as well as a clear Section 1 and all new exterior paint. The classic white and black galley-style kitchen complements the original hardwood and tile floors, enhanced by 2-inch baseboard trim throughout. A separate laundry area within the main home adds practicality and convenience. Outside, a detached garage tucked behind privacy fencing ensures additional seclusion. The backyard beckons with a covered patio, ample open space for gatherings, and the potential for personalized landscaping. Ideally situated near freeways, the American River, parks, shopping centers, and more, this home offers a blend of vintage charm and modern convenience in a prime location. Take advantage of this opportunity to own a piece of East Sacramento's history!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on a beautiful tree lined street in one Sacramento's most desired neighborhoods, this meticulously kept home has modern finish while oozing with 1920's charm. From original hardwood floors, windows, and dual fireplaces to custom designed stained-glass windows, no detail is left unfinished. The natural light throughout the home is perfectly designed and is amplified in the contractor designed kitchen complete with a built-in espresso machine and high-end appliances. This house provides a unique indoor-outdoor floor plan, effectively optimizing the entire lot and utilized year round. Professionally landscaped with a fountain and hot tub, this outdoor oasis is perfect for entertaining. A multi-purpose additional 380 square foot structure provides endless possibilities. An electric gate provides 2 enclosed parking spots (One in garage), a rarity in East Sacramento. A walkable neighborhood, this home is approximate to absolutely everything! Walking distance to all the neighborhood attractions, and all local hospitals. A must see to fully understand the charm and value of this home, it's a true gem!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Wonderful classic Victorian in superb downtown neighborhood, with many classic features, including hardwood floors, arched ceilings, and classic woodwork upstairs. Per executor, home has had a number of updates in recent years, including plumbing, electrical and panel, new central HVAC and tankless water heater in 2023, and new exterior paint in 2023 . There are two bedrooms with Jack-and-Jill bathroom upstairs, large front room is combination living dining room. Large kitchen with breakfast nook, lots and lots of storage. Sliding glass door off nook opens to large deck overlooking backyard. Downstairs has large room that could be two bedrooms, full bathroom, amazing amount of storage, living room and dining room. With two separate entrances downstairs, could be remodeled into one or even two extra units. And huge backyard could possibly accommodate an ADU. Front driveway allows parking for 1-3 cars off street, with extra parking behind drive in gate. Back of property accessible from alley allows for RV access and parking. Or you can build a new garage - the possibilities are endless. Better see this one today!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This property is situated in the highly sought-after T Street Parkway area of Elmhurst, Sacramento. It boasts a main house with two bedrooms and one bathroom, featuring an exceptionally large master bedroom that includes a sitting area or office space. The home offers a completely renovated kitchen equipped with brand new appliances and modern air conditioning and heating systems. Additionally, there is a 380-square-foot ADU that has been converted and remodeled, equipped with a new split AC unit, a hot water tank, and a garden view. This property is unique in it's charm, character, and quality, which are traits that are rarely replicated today. The living room overlooks the park and features large windows that brighten the space, where neighbors often gather for BBQ's, T-street garage sales in the summer, and well-known Christmas parties hosted by different homeowners each year. Just a short walk from the UC Davis Hospital and conveniently close to freeways. The property is also within walking distance of Trader Joe's, Corti Brothers, and the best butcher shop in town, making life on T Street highly desirable.
Confidential Remarks: The listing agent has small interest in the property. Quality remodeling was done throughout the property. The garage already has a washbasin, shower, and large closet. The permit is unknown. Offer review as submitted. Escrow has been opened with Chicago Title. The Prelim, NHD report from Disclosure Source, and Home Inspection are attached.
